name: Nagflix
description:
The game was created in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48.

Theme: Deeper and deeper.

The essence of the game is in the floating messages (to see them, you can not click the "exit" button").

MYline media programmer (https://www.instagram.com/myline.media/); 

DerpyDino35 artist & game designer (https://www.flowcode.com/page/derpydino35);

the davestroyer artist & game designer (https://game-dav.itch.io/).

Germiboy music & audio;
